title: Pharmacological inhibition of PLK2 kinase activity mitigates cognitive decline but aggravates APP pathology in a sex-dependent manner in APP/PS1 mouse model of Alzheimer's disease
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Laura Martínez-Drudis, Morgan Bérard, Dylan Musiol, Serge Rivest, Abid Oueslati
